mapper.select: SELECT LIB_NO AS no , LIB_NAME AS name , LIB_LOCATION AS location , LIB_LONGITUDE AS longitude , LIB_LATITUDE AS latitude , LIB_TEL AS tel , LIB_IMG_PATH AS imgPath , LIB_BUSINESS_HOURS AS businessHours FROM BOOKHUB_LIBRARIES WHERE LIB_NO = #{NO}

SELECT L.LIB_NO AS "library.no" , L.LIB_NAME AS "library.name" , LIB_LOCATION AS "library.location" , LIB_LONGITUDE AS "library.longitude" , LIB_LATITUDE AS "library.latitude" , LIB_TEL AS "library.tel" , LIB_IMG_PATH AS "library.imgPath" , LIB_BUSINESS_HOURS AS "library.businessHours" , S.BOOK_STOCK AS stock FROM BOOKHUB_LIBRARIES L, BOOKHUB_STOCKS S WHERE L.LIB_NO = S.LIB_NO and S.book_no = #{bookNo}
